title: MegaTagmension Blanc + Neptune VS Zombies – Deluxe Edition – v1.01 (Update 1)
body:

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on MegaTagmension.Blanc.Neptune.VS.Zombies.Deluxe.Edition.Cracked-3DM non-scene release: 1,858,265,594 bytes
  • MegaTagmension.Blanc.Neptune.VS.Zombies.Update.1.and.Crack-3DM installed over
  • Alternative UberPsyX crack added to NoDVD folder, allowing you to play multiplayer on official servers with Steam active
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of Japanese voiceovers and Deluxe Edition bonus content
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 1.7 GB to 950 MB~1.4 GB)
  • Installation takes 3-7 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 3 GB

Game Description

The prestigious Gamicademi – a school of fading glory. To put it back in the spotlight, Blanc and friends decide to film a zombie flick on campus. All’s quiet on the set until real zombies start crawling out of the woodworks! Now they’ve got to send these zombies to detention in this hack ‘n’ slash or else be history!

This special bundle includes MegaTagmension Blanc and the Deluxe DLC. The Deluxe DLC includes a digital art book, digital soundtrack, digital wallpapers, and ringtones based off MegaTagmension Blanc.

Deluxe Pack DLC includes the following contents!

1. 25 page Digital Art Book including never before released art works.
2. Digital Soundtrack with 21 tracks.
3. Wallpapers
4. 4 different ringtones
